Package classes

Class Item

java.lang.Object
classes.Item
public class Item extends Object
Item is a class that handles the Item instances and its methods.

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item(String n, int amt_yo, Color c, String img)
      Creates an item objects
      Parameters:
      n - Name of the object
      amt_yo - Amount of yarn over than the item needs for completion
      c - Color theme of the item
      img - File name of the logo of the item

  • Method Details

    • addProgress

      public void addProgress(double YO)
      Adds progress to an item's progressYarnOver. If the the item's progressYarnOver is greater than amtYO after the addition, the item's would be added by a certain amount. Also refreshes progress display in game window
      Parameters:
      YO - Amount of YO added to item's progressYarnOver
      Throws:
      ItemNotFoundException - If the item that the the YO will be added to doesn't exist

    • getItem

      public static Item getItem(String n) throws ItemNotFoundException
      Returns an item with the same name as a String input
      Returns:
      Item instance with the same name as the input
      Throws:
      ItemNotFoundException - If the Item with the same name as the inputted String wasn't found the list of Items
